title: Hard Problems
summary: Master advanced algorithms and tackle challenging optimization problems.

problems.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Given two sorted arrays, find the median of the two sorted arrays. The overall run time complexity should be O(log (m+n)).

problems.title: Merge k Sorted Lists
problems.description: You are given an array of k linked-lists, each linked-list is sorted in ascending order. Merge all linked-lists into one sorted linked-list.

problems.title: Trapping Rain Water
problems.description: Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map where the width of each bar is 1, compute how much water it can trap after raining.

problems.title: Largest Rectangle in Histogram
problems.description: Given an array of integers representing the histogram's bar height where the width of each bar is 1, return the area of the largest rectangle.

problems.title: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.description: You are given an array of integers and a sliding window of size k. Return the maximum element in each window.
